id: DPDPA Rules/Power to Call for Information from Data Fiduciaries or Intermediaries
title: Rule 22: Power to Call for Information from Data Fiduciaries or Intermediaries
description: Rule 22 equips the Data Protection Board of India with the authority to demand information from organizations involved in data processing. This rule is crucial because the Board cannot effectively enforce the law without access to detailed records, evidence, and clarifications from Data Fiduciaries and intermediaries.
source: @site/docs/2. DPDPA Rules/22- Power to Call for Information from Data Fiduciaries or Intermediaries.md
